video.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
video.synopsis: This edgy police procedural follows members of the Special Victims Unit as they investigate sexual offenses such as rape, incest and pedophilia.

episodes.synopsis: An immigrant maid accuses a powerful Italian politician of rape. But her credibility is questioned when it's revealed that she lied about her past.
episodes.title: Scorched Earth

episodes.synopsis: The squad tries to persuade a reluctant witness to step up when a highly respected basketball coach is accused of abusing his high school players.
episodes.title: Personal Fouls

episodes.synopsis: When a 13-year-old girl becomes pregnant after being raped, Benson and Amaro uncover potentially lethal secrets about a powerful political family.
episodes.title: Blood Brothers

episodes.synopsis: Rollins thinks she has identified a serial rapist whom she pursued in Georgia, but the accused's suicide attempt prompts the squad to dig deeper.
episodes.title: Double Strands

episodes.synopsis: When a vacationing couple's baby goes missing on Halloween, the squad investigates and discovers a history of domestic abuse and drunkenness.
episodes.title: Missing Pieces

episodes.synopsis: Benson tangles with an astute defense attorney who is determined to prove that there is racial bias against his African-American client.
episodes.title: True Believers

episodes.synopsis: Cragen goes undercover to pursue a mobster linked to the brutal death of a Russian mail-order bride, who turns out to have a tumultuous past.
episodes.title: Russian Brides

episodes.synopsis: A mentally unstable man claims to have witnessed the rape of a psychiatric patient, but the squad members have a difficult time uncovering the truth.
episodes.title: Educated Guess

episodes.synopsis: The disappearance of a young boy on his way home from school leads Tutuola and Rollins deep into the Romani community, which distrusts police.
episodes.title: Lost Traveler

episodes.synopsis: A missing 14-year-old girl is found working as a prostitute, and a sting operation to arrest the men paying for her leads to a pro football player.
episodes.title: Spiraling Down

episodes.synopsis: After an actress is raped on stage during a theater performance, the SVU detectives have trouble identifying the masked perpetrator.
episodes.title: Theatre Tricks

episodes.synopsis: The CEO of a military contractor is uncooperative with SVU after being sexually assaulted. Benson becomes interested in the new ADA.
episodes.title: Official Story

episodes.synopsis: A woman found drugged in Central Park leads SVU detectives to arrest a reality TV producer who has been sexually assaulting prospective cast members.
episodes.title: Father's Shadow

episodes.synopsis: The SVU detectives seek a motive for a home invasion that leaves a husband and wife dead and their teenage daughter in critical condition.
episodes.title: Home Invasions

episodes.synopsis: When an underage prostitute disappears, the detectives discover a pattern of several missing escorts who all posted ads on a popular website.
episodes.title: Hunting Ground

episodes.synopsis: Benson's half brother, Simon Marsden, asks for help in a battle against Child Services. Benson investigates a newborn abandoned near a hospital.
episodes.title: Child's Welfare

episodes.synopsis: Benson sees a connection between a new rape case and one she solved eight years ago, leading her to wonder if she convicted the right man.
episodes.title: Justice Denied

episodes.synopsis: After a man witnesses his wife being sexually assaulted during a video chat, the SVU detectives begin to suspect that she may not be a victim.
episodes.title: Valentine¿s Day

episodes.synopsis: After a series of rapes in Soho, a vigilante group and a reporter dog the SVU detectives' investigation, which is turning up few leads.
episodes.title: Street Revenge

episodes.synopsis: The detectives investigate the disappearance of a teenage girl and learn that she was searching for her sperm donor father.
episodes.title: Father Dearest

episodes.synopsis: SVU attempts to connect the assault of a local teacher with a series of beatings of gay men, including the fiancé of Tutuola's son.
episodes.title: Learning Curve

episodes.synopsis: A runaway teenager who becomes involved in self-mutilation leads the SVU detectives into a dark world that includes ritual amputation.
episodes.title: Strange Beauty

episodes.synopsis: The investigation of a dead escort at a bachelor party leads the detectives to their former colleague Detective Cassidy, who's working undercover.
episodes.title: Rhodium Nights

episodes.synopsis: The SVU detectives deal with the investigation of Capt. Cragen, who's been suspended, and the arrival of a tough new captain, Steven Harris.
episodes.title: Lost Reputation

episodes.synopsis: Detective Amaro sets out on his own to uncover the truth in the murder case against Capt. Cragen. One of the detectives suffers a tragic accident.
episodes.title: Above Suspicion

episodes.synopsis: A female romance novelist is raped by a talk show host and intends to press charges, but a secret in her past could destroy her career if unearthed.
episodes.title: Twenty-Five Acts

episodes.synopsis: Now that Capt. Cragen is back, the SVU devotes itself to breaking up a sex trafficking operation, but Lt. Alexandra Eames halts their efforts.
episodes.title: Acceptable Loss

episodes.synopsis: Investigating the abduction of a boy from Morningside Heights, the detectives recall a similar kidnapping in the same neighborhood 13 years ago.
episodes.title: Manhattan Vigil

episodes.synopsis: The SVU detectives try to find an underage girl who followed her older sister to a college party and is now in the clutches of a high-tech kidnapper.
episodes.title: Friending Emily

episodes.synopsis: A child abduction case becomes a custody dispute when the kidnapper is tracked down and claims to be the baby's biological mother.
episodes.title: Vanity's Bonfire

episodes.synopsis: When a professor at a prestigious private school is accused of sexual abuse, the SVU's investigation hits a wall -- until more victims come forward.
episodes.title: Lesson's Learned

episodes.synopsis: The SVU squad digs for information about a man who went on a killing rampage through New York -- and about his last known contact, a prostitute.
episodes.title: Dreams Deferred

episodes.synopsis: Det. Tutuola's ex-brother-in-law is arrested for allegedly assaulting a priest, and the ensuing investigation uncovers a church scandal.
episodes.title: Presumed Guilty

episodes.synopsis: A rape victim is promptly arrested when her ex-boyfriend is found murdered, but Detective Benson gathers evidence that points to a different suspect.
episodes.title: Beautiful Frame

episodes.synopsis: The detectives nab a suspect involved in brutal attacks against gay men. ADA Barba faces a tricky murder case and an unpredictable defense attorney.
episodes.title: Criminal Hatred

episodes.synopsis: Learning that several convicted felons might be sexual assault victims, Benson reopens the case of a murderer on death row, revealing his childhood.
episodes.title: Monster's Legacy

episodes.synopsis: After SVU detectives nab a suspect in a reopened cold case, it appears the case might be connected to several unsolved ones across the country.
episodes.title: Secrets Exhumed

episodes.synopsis: Rollins's pregnant sister shows up beaten by her boyfriend, who then arrives unexpectedly. Rollins takes drastic action that jeopardizes his job.
episodes.title: Deadly Ambition

episodes.synopsis: An aspiring singer is physically abused by her hip-hop star boyfriend but refuses to help SVU detectives build a case against him.
episodes.title: Funny Valentine

episodes.synopsis: Detective Cassidy is removed from a case due to a rape accusation, and his lawyer employs rather unorthodox methods to prove his innocence.
episodes.title: Undercover Blue

episodes.synopsis: A female sports reporter accuses a cameraman of rape, but before the trial begins she learns she's pregnant, complicating the case for ADA Barba.
episodes.title: Legitimate Rape

episodes.synopsis: When a girl suffers suspicious injuries, the SVU squad's investigation of her family reveals a violent 10-year-old boy in desperate need of treatment.
episodes.title: Born Psychopath

episodes.synopsis: Looking into the alleged rape of a sorority pledge, the SVU team encounters resistance from suspected fraternity members and school administrators.
episodes.title: Girl Dishonored

episodes.synopsis: A teen is assaulted at a rock concert, and the SVU detectives are hoping a security guard -- a war veteran with PTSD -- can identify the culprits.
episodes.title: Traumatic Wound

episodes.synopsis: As sniper attacks on the NYPD have the SVU racing to track down the culprit, Tutuola makes a connection between the shootings and his past cases.
episodes.title: Poisoned Motive

episodes.synopsis: As a woman with physical trauma lies in a coma, the detectives uncover a wild side to this seemingly normal wife and mother of two young boys.
episodes.title: Brief Interlude

episodes.synopsis: Rollins arrests a man for exposing himself, but the detectives have trouble identifying and nailing him; before long, he's wanted for a heinous crime.
episodes.title: Her Negotiation

episodes.synopsis: Benson struggles to stay alive after being kidnapped by serial rapist William Lewis and taken to a beach house on Long Island.
episodes.title: Surrender Benson

episodes.synopsis: Benson returns from leave despite her colleagues' concerns, and the detectives follow a lead that reopens a disturbing cold case.
episodes.title: Imprisoned Lives

episodes.synopsis: When a white celebrity chef shoots a black teenager and claims self-defense, the racially charged case proves tricky for ADA Barba.
episodes.title: American Tragedy

episodes.synopsis: IAB sends Cassidy undercover in a precinct where an officer who complained of sexual misconduct was committed to a psych ward.
episodes.title: Internal Affairs

episodes.synopsis: During Munch's retirement party, a rape victim contacts Benson for help, believing she was raped again at a party.
episodes.title: Wonderland Story

episodes.synopsis: ADA Barba's objectivity is called into question when his childhood friend, the frontrunner in the race for mayor, is accused of rape.
episodes.title: October Surprise

episodes.synopsis: When a music teacher and reality TV star is accused of molesting a 4-year-old student, Rollins urges the detectives to tread lightly.
episodes.title: Dissonant Voices

episodes.synopsis: The detectives suspect that a Coast Guard officer on leave has been raped, but they run into countless obstacles while conducting their investigation.
episodes.title: Military Justice

episodes.synopsis: Rollins finds herself in the middle of a complicated case when a friend from her Gamblers Anonymous meetings claims she was raped.
episodes.title: Rapist Anonymous

episodes.synopsis: The stress of William Lewis's upcoming trial hinders Benson's recovery -- and intensifies when he decides to represent himself in court.
episodes.title: Psycho/Therapist

episodes.synopsis: Amaro finds himself in the hot seat after shooting a teenage suspect during a standoff. Meanwhile, it's the end of an era for Capt. Cragen.
episodes.title: Amaro's One-Eighty

episodes.synopsis: The detectives face widespread corruption when they try to work with New Jersey law enforcement on the case of an underage rape victim.
episodes.title: Jersey Breakdown

episodes.synopsis: When a 16-year-old girl disappears from a party, the detectives suspect that her boyfriend is involved with a local gang.
episodes.title: Betrayal's Climax

episodes.synopsis: A boy with behavioral problems disappears from his bedroom, and concern turns to panic when he's spotted with known criminals.
episodes.title: Wednesday's Child

episodes.synopsis: Benson arrests a comedian who's notorious for joking about sexual assault when a student accuses him of rape, but Barba has trouble building a case.
episodes.title: Comic Perversion

episodes.synopsis: A friend asks Rollins for helping locating his missing nephew, who the detective discovers may have been pranked by his football team.
episodes.title: Gridiron Soldier

episodes.synopsis: When Rollins goes to an underground gambling club, the managers find out she's a cop and threaten to expose her unless she does them a favor.
episodes.title: Gambler's Fallacy

episodes.synopsis: A journalist profiling Benson interferes with SVU's investigation of a suspected hate crime, putting Barba's case in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Criminal Stories

episodes.synopsis: A mother is accused of child endangerment when she leaves her daughter home alone for several days, but Benson suspects there's more to the story.
episodes.title: Downloaded Child

episodes.synopsis: William Lewis escapes from prison and takes a young girl hostage, demanding that Benson tell the media that she lied at his trial.
episodes.title: Beast's Obesssion

episodes.synopsis: Following her confrontation with William Lewis, a traumatized Benson must face a grand jury convened by the Brooklyn district attorney.
episodes.title: Post-Mortem Blues

episodes.synopsis: When a TV producer's estranged wife accuses him of molesting their daughter, the detectives must determine whether the allegations are true.
episodes.title: Reasonable Doubt

episodes.synopsis: An SVU sting to catch sexual predators leads to a famous photographer, but Barba and the detectives are at odds over the case's merit.
episodes.title: Thought Criminal

episodes.synopsis: While Amaro is under investigation, the rest of the unit investigates a string of robberies and rapes tied to an escort service.
episodes.title: Spring Awakening
